name: Timeline Arsonist, Alisaris
text:
When this card enters your field, search your main deck for a card named "Blazing Metropolis, Vell-Savaria", reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck.
Resonators you control gain Swiftness, Target Attack, and First Strike.
God's Art [Total Recall] RR2: This card deals 100 damage to each J/resonator your opponent controls for each card in your removed area. Then, you may put any number of cards from your removed area into your graveyard. (Play God's Art [Total Recall] only once per game.)
